entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is being shepherded from class to class by teachers.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He seems to be enjoying the atmosphere of terror and suspicion.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the former Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Draco Malfoy thinks he might have been removed by his father.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He left the school with Dumbledore.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is an interim Headmaster at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Draco Malfoy thinks she won't last long.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is one of Draco's friends.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is one of Draco's friends.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Snape passes by her during the Potions lesson.

relationships.description: Draco Malfoy is gloating about Dumbledore's removal from Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
Draco Malfoy thinks McGonagall will not last long as Headmaster at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
Draco Malfoy wants the Chamber of Secrets to remain open.
